posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
What I'm really trolling for is a T206 card signed by Ty Cobb, but really I'll take any that I don't already have.

Email SignedT206@gmail.com if you've got any signed Pre-WW I cards at all.  Heck, I'll even take a scan if it's one I've never seen before.


_  _  _  _  _  _  _ _ 

Visit[url]http://www.t206collector.com[/url] for Net54 T206 archive, signed deadball card galleries, articles and more!
